articles.description: David Nduwimana sang Advance Australia Fair before the third match of the rugby series between the Australian Wallabies and New Zealand All Blacks at ANZ Stadium on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Rugby fans hailed an African singer's version of the Australian national anthem at the Bledisloe Cup the 'best ever'.

articles.description: OLIVER HOLT: Lewis Hamilton is the greatest active sportsman Britain possesses. For some reason, he still does not occupy a prominent place in the hearts of the British people.

articles.title: Marius Zaliukas dead: Former Leeds and Hearts defender passes away age 36 - Mirror Online

articles.content:
